verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: wants] [ARG1: to reverse a trend of fewer children participating in sports and make youth sports more accessible to economically disadvantaged students] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] wants to [V: reverse] [ARG1: a trend of fewer children participating in sports] and make youth sports more accessible to economically disadvantaged students .
President Donald Trump wants to reverse a trend of [ARG0: fewer children] [V: participating] [ARG1: in sports] and make youth sports more accessible to economically disadvantaged students .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] wants to reverse a trend of fewer children participating in sports and [V: make] [ARG1: youth sports more accessible to economically disadvantaged students] .
